def_cn: （狗、猫等动物的）血统记录，纯种谱系
def_en: If a dog, cat, or other animal has a pedigree, its ancestors are known and recorded. An animal is considered to have a good pedigree when all its known ancestors are of the same type.

def_cn: 有纯种谱系证明的；纯种的
def_en: A pedigree animal is descended from animals which have all been of a particular type, and is therefore considered to be of good quality.
Someone's pedigree is their background or their ancestors.
